6.title: Divine Relics (IV)
6.description: Level up a 4-star Relic to Max level

7.title: Divine Relics (V)
7.description: Level up a 5-star Relic to Max level

11.title: Ever-Burning Amber
11.description: Tread on the Path of Preservation
11.comment: Unlock Fire Trailblazer during the main story

12.title: I Have Finished The Race
12.description: Level up all Traces for a character to the maximum level

13.title: My Childhood
13.description: Reach Character Level 40 with any character

14.title: My Apprenticeship
14.description: Reach Character Level 60 with any character

15.title: My Universities
15.description: Reach Character Level 80 with any character

16.title: Path Traces (I)
16.description: Activate or level up character Traces 3 time(s)

17.title: Path Traces (II)
17.description: Activate or level up character Traces 20 time(s)

18.title: Path Traces (III)
18.description: Activate or level up character Traces 50 time(s)

19.title: Path Traces (IV)
19.description: Activate or level up character Traces 100 time(s)

20.title: Sovereign Warframe
20.description: Equip a character with level 15 5-star Relics in all slots

22.title: A Professional Onlooker
22.comment: Find Qingque, who is "working hard" at playing games...

24.title: Everwinter Night
24.comment: You have arrived at the city of Belobog.

25.title: Half the Wizard of Oz
25.description: Defeat the tin man and the little girl
25.comment: Svarog and Clara became your friends!

27.title: My Heart Lies With the Stars
27.description: Launch a journey into the vast Galaxy
27.comment: Congratulations! You have boarded the Astral Express!

28.title: Omniscia Spares None
28.comment: Successfully capture the Stellaron Hunter Kafka.

29.title: Prophets Do Not Prophesize
29.description: Witness the mystery of the Divination Commission's matrix
29.comment: Interrogate Kafka with the Matrix of Prescience...

30.title: Sauntering Fox
30.description: Diplomacy is but a trade of opinions...
30.comment: Confer with the leader(s) of the Xianzhou Luofu.

31.title: Slayer of a Very "Deer" Friend
31.description: Try to walk on the Path of the Hunt...
31.comment: Help Xianzhou to defeat the Abomination of Abundance, "Ebon Deer"

32.title: The Deer Hunter
32.description: The Furnace Endured, the Antlers Obscured
32.comment: Save the Artisanship Commission from the crisis.

34.title: A Casualty of Armors
34.description: Receive a total of 10,000 DMG on 1 character in a single battle

35.title: A Song of Vice and Dire
35.description: Inflict both Burn and Freeze upon 1 enemy at the same time
35.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with blessings.

36.title: A Thousand Cuts...
36.description: Defeat 3 enemies using DoT in a single battle
36.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

37.title: Accidental Amnesia
37.description: Clear Decaying Shadow's Gauge Recollection and cause its ability, Liberation of the Golden Age, to fail
37.comment: Can be found in Backwater Pass (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Mirage (Stagnant Shadow).

38.title: Achilles' Horse
38.description: Defeat Voidranger: Trampler when it's aiming at an ally
38.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

39.title: Add Insult to Injury
39.description: Deal a total of 20,000 DMG to enemies inflicted with Weakness Break in a single battle
39.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with weakness break blessings.

40.title: All Men Must Die
40.description: Receive a killing blow from enemies when at 100% HP
40.comment: Bring one weak unleveled unit against a tough enemy.

41.title: Always Come Prepared
41.description: A character has 5 or more buffs at the beginning of a turn
41.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe.

42.title: Annihilation
42.description: Deal equal to or more than 150,000 DMG in a single attack
42.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

43.title: Attack! No Matter the Cost!
43.description: Trigger Silvermane Lieutenant's Shield Reflect at least 4 time(s) and defeat it
43.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

44.title: Blade of Taixu
44.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

45.title: Bring a Gun to a Knife Fight
45.description: Deal 20000 DMG or higher to an enemy whose HP percentage is equal to or lower than 1% in a single attack

46.title: Break Till Broken
46.description: Inflict Weakness Break 4 time(s) upon the same enemy in a single battle

47.title: Bullet Time
47.description: Allies have 10 turns of action unbroken by enemies
47.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with the Path of Remembrance (freeze enemies perpetually).

48.title: Cataclysm Disruptor
48.description: Prevent the Doomsday Beast from using Impending Doom in Echo of War

49.title: Chad Norris
49.description: Defeat the Guardian Shadow without enraging it
49.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Fulmination (Stagnant Shadow), Forgotten Hall and Everwinter Hill.

50.title: Code of Chivalry
50.description: Defeat Gepard without defeating the Silvermane Guards that were summoned
50.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

51.title: Coffee Lover
51.description: In a single battle, use Himeko's Ultimate 3 times
51.comment: You can borrow a friend's Himeko.

53.title: Decapitation Strike
53.description: Defeat the Silvermane Lieutenant without defeating any Silvermane Guards
53.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

54.title: Deus Ex Machina
54.description: Inflict Weakness Break on enemies 3 time(s) using the Trailblazer (Destruction) in a single battle

55.title: Doldrums
55.description: Make Stormbringer fail to use Windfall Storm due to having no ally with Wind Shear
55.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 2.

56.title: DoT Breaker (I)
56.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

57.title: DoT Breaker (II)
57.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

58.title: Earthwork
58.description: An ally has a combined Shield effect greater than 5,000 at any time
58.comment: Best achieved in Simulated Universe with shield blessings and Gepard.

59.title: Electric Dreams
59.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Lightning Break DMG in a single battle

60.title: Energy Grandet
60.description: Have a character whose Energy is at 100% at the beginning of a turn for 4 turns in a row
60.comment: Easier to achieve with Simulated Universe energy blessings and Tingyun.

61.title: Et tu, Bronya?
61.description: Use Bronya to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Cocolia
61.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

62.title: Extreme Survival
62.description: Win a battle with all four allies having HP percentages equal to or less than 5%
62.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio in Simulated Universe.

63.title: Fahrenheit 451
63.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Fire Break DMG in a single battle

64.title: Fire Breaker (I)
64.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Fire Break DMG

65.title: Fire Breaker (II)
65.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Fire Break DMG

66.title: Follow-Up Breaker (I)
66.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

67.title: Follow-Up Breaker (II)
67.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

68.title: Foolish Little Brother...
68.description: Use Serval to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Gepard
68.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 3.

69.title: Four-and-a-Half Pirouettes
69.description: Trigger Herta's talent with an ally's single attack, and have her twirl 5 time(s)
69.comment: Easiest to achieve in Silvermane Restricted Guard Zone Difficulty 1, Winter Soldier's March. 5 relatively weak enemies on that stage.

70.title: Friendly Fire
70.description: Defeat the Aurumaton Gatekeeper with the Entranced Ingenium: Illumination Dragonfish's "Candle Flame"
70.comment: Can be found in the Cavern of Corrosion - Path of Conflagration.

71.title: Full Metal Jacket
71.description: Stay alive after being hit by the Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit's Controlled Blasting ability
71.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 4.

72.title: Heavenly Hand
72.description: Use a Technique to defeat all enemies upon entering battle
72.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

73.title: Highway Star
73.description: Allies act for 100 times in a single battle

74.title: Hit It Where It Hurts Most
74.description: Defeat the Antimatter Engine without defeating either of the Doomsday Beast's hands in Echo of War
74.comment: Can be fought in Echo of War.

75.title: Homemade Crushed Ice
75.description: Defeat the Ice Edge summoned by Cocolia 4 time(s)
75.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

76.title: Hot-Blooded
76.description: Defeat Cocolia, Mother of Deception, without any ally being Frozen at any point of the battle in Echo of War
76.comment: Must be in Echo of War.

77.title: I Don't Get No Respect!
77.description: Enrage the Guardian Shadow with 4 character(s) in your team
77.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Fulmination (Stagnant Shadow), Forgotten Hall and Everwinter Hill. Just use the attack type she punishes you for with each character.

82.title: It's My Turn
82.description: Seele acts 5 time(s) in a row before the next ally unit's turn
82.comment: You can borrow a friend's Seele.

83.title: Ki Impact
83.description: Deal equal to or more than 20,000 DMG in a single attack

84.title: Lightning Breaker (I)
84.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Lightning Break DMG

85.title: Lightning Breaker (II)
85.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Lightning Break DMG

86.title: Listen...
86.description: Use the Trailblazer to fight boss Kafka and become Dominated by her
86.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

87.title: Memory, Sorrow, and Thorn
87.description: Inflict 4 DoT effects upon 1 enemie(s) at the same time
87.comment: Easiest to achieve in Simulated Universe with Path of Nihility.

88.title: Morituri Te Salutant
88.description: Defeat an enemy when a character has less than 1% of HP left
88.comment: Can be achieved by RNG with the Galactic Lotto Curio in Simulated Universe.

89.title: Mozambique Drill
89.description: Defeat 3 enemies with follow-up attacks in a single battle
89.comment: Units with follow-up attacks include March 7th, Clara, Herta, Himeko, and Yanqing. There is a blessing in Simulated Universe that converts all Ultimates a follow-up attacks.

90.title: No Offense
90.description: Remove buffs on enemies 5 time(s) in a single battle
90.comment: Can be done with Pela or the Light Cone "Return to Darkness".

91.title: One on One
91.description: Enter combat with 4 character(s) but win with only 1 character(s) still standing
91.comment: Can be done by bringing in 3 weak units and 1 strong one.

92.title: Over-Protective
92.description: Win 1 battle(s) without having Gepard's Shields take any DMG
92.comment: You can borrow a friend's Gepard for this.

93.title: Passing as a Flower in the City of the Dead
93.description: Revive 2 downed character(s) in a single battle
93.comment: Easier to achieve with Destruction blessings in Simulated Universe.

94.title: Perpetual Freezer
94.description: Freeze 1 enemies for 3 turns in a row
94.comment: Easier to achieve in Simulated Universe with plenty of freeze blessings.

95.title: Perish Song
95.description: Get knocked out together with the enemy
95.comment: There are Patrol Bots in Robot Settlement and Alchemists in Artisanship Commission (southwest) that explode when killed, dealing damage to you. With precise timing, kill them so that you get KO'd by the explosion. Only have 1 or 2 units on team.

96.title: Physical Breaker (I)
96.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Physical Break DMG

97.title: Physical Breaker (II)
97.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Physical Break DMG

98.title: Preemptive Strike
98.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

101.title: Regurgitation
101.description: Cause Frigid Prowler to fail to use Devour Otherling
101.comment: Can be found in Corridor of Fading Echoes (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Rime (Stagnant Shadow).

102.title: Reverberating Ruin
102.comment: Easier to achieve when fighting the Doomsday Beast in Echo of War.

103.title: Right-Hand Man's Many Right-Handed Right Hands
103.description: Defeat Svarog after destroying 4 Auxiliary Robot Arm Unit(s)
103.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 4.

104.title: Road to Canossa
104.description: Interrupt Cocolia's use of "Wraith of Winterland Saints" when she is charging
104.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6 or Echo of War. Either break or freeze her.

105.title: Save the Princess
105.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6.

106.title: Schrödinger's Other Cat
106.description: Inflict 5 Quantum Weakness Breaks in a single battle

107.title: Serial Breaker
107.description: Inflict Weakness Break to 4 enemies in a single action

108.title: Serious Punch
108.description: Deal equal to or more than 1,000 DMG in a single attack

109.title: Serval's Parting Gift
109.description: Use Serval to deal the final blow in a victory against boss Cocolia
109.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 6 or Echo of War. With fast hands, you can reset the game and retry the battle if some other unit defeats Cocolia.

110.title: Sunstorm
110.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Wind Break DMG in a single battle

111.title: Surge of Tiles
111.description: Qingque starts her turn in the "Hidden Hand" state for 3 turn(s) in a row
111.comment: Requires RNG but also a fast team for better results.

112.title: Technique Breaker (I)
112.comment: Easiest to achieve with Serval in Simulated Universe World 1.

113.title: Thank You for Your Service
113.description: Defeat Bronya without defeating the Silvermane Guards
113.comment: Can be found in Forgotten Hall 14.

114.title: The Cold Equations
114.description: Inflict 5 Ice Weakness Breaks in a single battle

115.title: The Demolished Man
115.description: Defeat 3 enemies with Physical Break DMG in a single battle

116.title: The Limping Lupine
116.description: Defeat Automaton Direwolf without triggering Felling Order
116.comment: Can be found in Great Mine (Jarilo-VI), Shape of Spike (Stagnant Shadow).

117.title: Trauma Team Platinum Bundle
117.description: An ally heals for more than 8,000 HP in a single heal
117.comment: Best achieved in Simulated Universe with healing blessings.

118.title: Trial of Thirteen
118.description: In a single battle, make Svarog block attacks toward Clara 13 times
118.comment: It might be exactly 13 times on the dot.

119.title: Unimaginably Imaginary
119.description: Inflict 5 Imaginary Weakness Breaks in a single battle

121.title: When the National Anthem Rings
121.description: Have ally Bronya use "The Belobog March" 1 time(s) when fighting the bosses Gepard, Cocolia, and Bronya respectively
121.comment: Unfortunately you need to own Bronya to get this achievement.

122.title: Will of Steel
122.description: In a single battle against boss Kafka, dispel Dominated 3 times
122.comment: Can be found in Simulated Universe World 5.

123.title: Wind Breaker (I)
123.description: Defeat 20 enemies with Wind Break DMG

124.title: Wind Breaker (II)
124.description: Defeat 60 enemies with Wind Break DMG

125.title: Wrathful Aurumaton
125.description: In a single battle, cause Aurumaton Gatekeeper to enter the Wrath state 3 times
125.comment: Can be found in the Cavern of Corrosion - Path of Conflagration.

126.title: The Express Passenger's Guide to the Galaxy
